description: This file defines a Document class for managing documents, including methods for embedding, serialization, and deserialization.

classes.name: Document
classes.description: A dataclass for managing a document, including content, metadata, embedding, and related methods.

methods.name: embed
methods.description: Embeds the document using a provided or existing embedder.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Returns a dictionary representation of the document.

methods.name: from_dict
methods.description: Creates a Document instance from a dictionary.

methods.name: from_json
methods.description: Creates a Document instance from a JSON string.
